decisions.description: If creating the asset, we need to assign the value and valuation date variables to the same as the screen. If editing, we should leave them the same as the asset being updated.

Flow.description: Create and update assets. This flow allows users to input asset details and makes an API request to nova service that makes the update.

formulas.name: ErrorMessageDisplay
formulas.expression: CASE({!ErrorMessage}, "DATA_ERROR", "We couldn't find an asset to display here.", "NO_PERMISSION", "You do not have permission to perform this action.", "")
